price: Anaasε woankͻka sε: “Sε Nyankopͻn kyerεε me kwan a, anka mεka Nyamesurofoͻ no ho.
arabic: أَوۡ تَقُولَ لَوۡ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ هَدَىٰنِي لَكُنتُ مِنَ ٱلۡمُتَّقِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: aw taqūla law anna al-laha hadānī lakuntu mina al-mutaqīna
